title: I'm Lum-chan the Notorious/It's Raining Oil in Our Town
description: In the first episode, only high-schooler Ataru Moroboshi can stop an alien invasion by playing tag with the gorgeous princess of the invaders, Lum. Against very long odds, he wins, only to find he now has an unexpected wife. While she's away, Ataru accidentally calls a space taxi. The fare: the Earth's entire supply of petroleum!

title: Space Mail Delivery! Ten-chan Arrives!/Mrs Swallow and Mrs. Penguin
description: Just as the Moroboshi family is settling down and coming to grips with the idea that their luckless son has married into an extraterrestrial clan, a peach-shaped package arrives from (literally) out of nowhere, through the large hole it punched through the roof. Mrs. Moroboshi wonders how it tastes. Ataru wonders where it came from. Mr. Moroboshi wonders how he's going to pay off the mortgage now that there's a new repair bill looming. Lum's happy -- it's her infant (but streetwise) cousin, Jariten, or "Ten-chan" for short, coming to live with her and her new husband. And he breathes fire! Soon, Jariten's playing with the local fauna, and discovers that his alien candy has some interesting effects...

title: The Handsome Shape-Changer Rei Arrives!/Die, Ladykiller!
description: It was a dark and stormy night, and Shinobu is walking home. Suddenly, a spaceship crashes near her, and when she reaches the crash site, finds...a tiger-cow!? Who used to be Lum's fiancée!? And he's usually a stunningly handsome guy!? Can Ataru survive the duel for Lum's love? (Would he want to?) And what happens afterward when the food-obsessed Rei is loosed on an undeserving population of Tokyo with the sum of his Japanese language knowledge being: "Will you cook for me forever?"

title: Kintaro of the Autumn Sky/Live Vigorously!
The Mysterious, Seductive Beauty Sakura/Virus in Distress
Love Triangle Black Hole/Hey Hey, It's a Little Demon
The Scary Electric Shock!/The Doll of Ill Will
Neptune Beyond the Closet/The Confusing Dinosaur Age
Sleeping Beauty Princess Kurama/Athletic Woman Hell!
description: The beautiful Crow princess Kurama is awakened by a kiss from Ataru. In accordance with her race's traditions, she must mate with him. Naturally Ataru is more than happy to oblige, but she wants absolutely nothing to do with him.

title: Pitter-Patter Christmas Eve
Ataru Genji Visits Heinkyo
Love Battle Royale/Father, You Were Strong
Hawaiian Swimsuit Thief Full Course from Hell
Mendou Arrives with Trouble!/Constellation-Go-Round
The Great Spring War/The Benten Corps' Return
Oh, Lonely Teacher! Kuribayashi Sensei Appears/Terrible Inspection Day
description: In part 1, Ataru's brutal new homeroom teacher Kuribayashi has it in for him, and has a Lolita-complex thing for Lum. In part 2, it's Open House Day at Tomobiki High School, and a confrontation between the mothers of Lum and Mendou bring both planets to the brink of interstellar war.

title: Fourth Dimensional Camera/Demonic Jogging
Girl's Day! Ran-chan's Arrival/Ran-chan's Introduction
description: Lum's childhood friend Ran comes to Earth, but she's here to seek revenge on Lum for all times that Lum got her in trouble when they were both little. She also tries to suck out Ataru's youth by kissing him.

title: Diary of Sorrowful Tomorrows/Whose Is This Child?
Sleeping in Class on a Wonderful Spring Day/Peach Blossom Poetry Contest
Duel! Ataru vs. Ataru/Waking to a Nightmare
The Great Space Matchmaking Operation
description: Lum's father tricks Lum into coming home in order to hold a matchmaking ceremony for her, where thousands of alien suitors await her. Little did they know that Ataru has found out, and is on his way to the Oni homeworld to crash the party.

title: The Big Springtime Picnic Uproar!
Beware of Earmuffs!
Fly, Imo-chan!
description: In the school biology class, Ataru care for a big caterpillar with an equally big appetite.

title: Ten's Love
What a Dracula!
description: Count Dracula awakens, and is seeking the blood of a lovely young girl. He chooses Lum as his next victim.

title: Lum's Education Lecture Course for Boys
description: After Mrs. Moroboshi shows her some of photos of a young Ataru, Lum decides that the best way to get him to like her is to travel 10 years into the past and condition him to do so while he's still a child.

title: From the Gardenia, with Love
description: A new flower shop has opened in town, and both Ataru and Ten attempt to win the affections of the beautiful young woman who works there.

title: A Beautiful Girl Brings Rain
description: A beautiful girl named Tsuyuko Amamori moves into Ataru's neighborhood, who happens to bring rain wherever she goes.

title: Gimme Back My Horn!
Shocking Library: Quiet Please!
Mr. Hanawa Arrives! It's the Springtime of Youth
Goblin in Distress, Yearning for People
Darling's Had It This Time!
Rei Returns! The Big Study Hall Panic!!
The Coming of the Mysterious Red Mantle!
Steal Darling! The Copy Operation!!
Thrilling Summer Date
So Long, Goodbye, Summer Days
Panic in a Typhoon!
description: The Moroboshis are preparing their home for a typhoon headed their way, and Lum and Ten can hardly wait, since neither of them was no idea what a typhoon is.

title: Drunkard's Boogie
description: At school, Ataru discovers that Oni become intoxicated by umeboshi (pickled plums), and that both Lum and Ten are the worst kind of drunks: mean drunks! Scores of students end up in the infirmary from Lum's electricity, and Ten's flames.

title: The Terror of Meow
description: Late one night atop the roof of the Moroboshi home, Ataru, Ten, and an eyepatch-wearing bruiser of a cat named Torajima fight for the affections of a beautiful cat-woman.

title: After You've Gone
description: Lum, Ataru, Megane & Co. are holding a party to celebrate the 1st anniversary of her arrival on Earth. After Ataru openly gripes about his life with Lum, she gets up and leaves. She can't be found, and it's feared she's left Earth for good.

title: Lum's Class Reunion
description: Lum's alien friends keep popping up at school, and disappearing right before Lum can have a chance to talk to them. Now her feelings are hurt because she feels she's being left out of whatever they're doing.

title: Lunchtime Eat-Out'ers Gather Round!
description: Lately the students of Tomobiki H.S. have been sneaking off campus to eat at the local eateries, and the faculty, led by Onsen, is conspiring to stop them at all costs. It's all-out war, with restaurant district as its battlefield!

title: Terror! The Deserted Fossil Grounds Mystery
Princess Kurama: A New Challenge!
The Terrifying Cavity Wars!
The Mendou Siblings!
description: Mendou's eccentric little sister Ryoko visits class, much to Mendou's chagrin.

title: There's a Cat on the Stairs
description: Ten brings a huge cat home with him, and he takes an immediate liking to Ataru's kotatsu (foot warmer), and sits on the staircase with it. It's dinnertime, and Ataru can't come downstairs to eat without getting pummeled by that darn cat.

title: Can a Raccoon Repay a Favor?!
The Do-or-Die Subspace Part-Time Job
The Big Year-End Party That Lum Organized!
Bad Boy Musashi: A Success Story
We'll Risk Our Lives During Classtime!
description: Onsen's had it with his students' shenanigans, and he's threatening weekend detention if they make so much as a peep in class. The class is determined to avoid detention at any cost, even as Ten shows up to harass them.

title: Domestic Quarrel: To Eat or Be Eaten?!
description: Lum's father got kicked out of the house for greedily eating both his and his wife's food. He has to crash at the Moroboshi's on Earth until things blow over, but now the big guy's eating them out of house and home.

title: Steal the Kiss of Miss Snow Queen!
St. Valentine's Day Horror
Love, Love, Catchball!
The Mendou Family's Masquerade Ball
Space Cold Panic!
Ryuunosuke Arrives! I Love the Sea!
Goodbye Season
description: Ataru confides to Megane that he is "giving up", and has chosen him as successor. Megane is elated as he imagines having Lum all to himself. Shinobu, having overheard their conversation, imagines that with Ataru out of the picture, there would change in the class' balance of power would result in her losing Mendou to Lum, causing repercussions far beyond Tomobiki High. She then conspires with the popular girls from the surrounding schools to stop Ataru and protect the status quo.

title: Ran-chan's Great Date Plan
Happy Birthday My Darling
description: Lum and Ataru's relationship becomes strained after she forgets his birthday.

title: Seeing Shangri-La as a Hell Camp!
The Groom's Name Is Ryunosuke
Bottled Letter Seashore Mystery!
description: Ataru, Lum, Mendou, Shinobu, and Ten are invited to a creepy old seaside inn for dinner. Little do they realize that they are intended to be dinner.

title: Dramatic Appearance! Mizunokoji Ton-chan!
Shinobu's Cinderella Story
Lum-chan the Ruthless Rebel
The Big Showdown! Sakura vs. Sakuranbo
Ghost Story! Old Man Willow!

roles.char: Old Man Of The Willow Tree

title: And Then There Were None
Firefighter Mommy Visits!
description: Ten's mother comes to Earth to visit him, but he's absolutely terrified. His mother is ironically a firefighter who's passionate about her job, responds to fire bells almost instantly, and deals with arsonists with sadistic brutality.

title: Darling's Dying!?
Pitiful! Mother of Love and Banishment!?
description: A rare look into the life and mind of Ataru's mother.

title: The House of Mendou: Summer Xmas
description: Ryoko invites couples from all over town to attend the a summer Christmas party at the Mendou estate. The couples, chained together, must rappel up a huge Christmas tree in order to reach the banquet at the top. The first couple to make it to the top will receive a kiss from either Ryoko or Mendou, those who fail will plummet to their deaths!

title: Panic in the Haunted Inn
description: Lum, Ataru, Mendou and Shinobu stay at a gloomy old inn that they later discover is haunted by a ghost. But the ghost in question isn't nearly as scary as the elderly couple who runs the inn.

title: Oh! The Memories of Mother
description: Ryuunosuke demands that her father tell her what kind of person her mother was like, but getting a straight answer from him proves frustrating as he tells her one whopper after another.

title: Full of Sunshine, Full of Amours
Big Battle! Ten vs. Ataru
description: Ten has gotten sick and tired of getting clobbered every morning by Ataru, so he devises ways to get back at him and win for a change.

title: Terror! Attack of the Killer Potatoes!
description: At a Mendou-owned mountain retreat, Ataru, Lum, Mendou, and Shinobu find themselves in a bizarre 'revenge of nature' scenario as they are attacked by Tororo potatoes.

title: Galactic Teacher CAO-2 Strikes Back!
description: Oyuki meets with Lum, Benten, and Ran to warn them that their old elementary school teacher, CAO-2, has escaped. CAO-2 was a huge, menacing robot teacher shaped like a huge chalkboard eraser. He ran his class with an iron fist, had zero-tolerance for all the pranks that Lum and Benten pulled on him, and often punished them by hurling himself at them. The girls managed to trap him on a stalactite on some remote planet after a chase through space, but now that he's escaped, he's looking for revenge!

title: Outraged! Piteous Boy Shutaro!
description: Lum tries to help Mendou cure his phobias by traveling back to a point in time before he developed those fears. Soon after the gang arrives, they encounter a very bratty little Mendou.

title: Wow! The Mysterious Matsutake Mushroom Soup!
description: Onsen's class has smuggled food ingredients into the classroom for a huge 'nabemono' feast. Cherry shows up with some mushrooms that Ataru identifies as being the highly-prized Matsutake mushrooms. But if these are indeed Matsutake mushrooms, why is it that everyone who's eaten them acting so strange?

title: Enraged Lum!
description: During another one of Ataru & Ten's fights, Ten accidentally burns the scarf that Lum had made for him, yet strangely Lum isn't upset with Ten. Ataru then tries to goad her to become angry with Ten, and later Lum practices disciplining him aboard her UFO. Meanwhile, Ten wanders around town trying to think of the proper way to apologize to her.

title: Lum & Ataru: A Night Alone
Lady Ryuunosuke!
description: Onsen-Mark takes Ryuunosuke under his wing and attempts to teach her how to be a woman.

title: Document! Who'll Be Miss Tomobiki?
description: The Principal holds a beauty pageant at the school. Lum, Shinobu, Ryuunosuke, Ran, and Sakura are the lead contenders; while Ataru is chosen to be the judge.

title: Bizarre! The Medicine of Selflessness!
Shutaro's Jinxed Morning
The Story of a Traveling Snowman
Lum-chan's Ancient Japanese Fairytales
Shine! The Blessed Bra!!
Challenge! Benten VS. The Girl Trio!!
description: A trio of middle school-aged girls, who fancy themselves as a gang, steal Benten's chain. They also challenge her, Lum, and Oyuki to a showdown on top of Tomobiki HS for the chain.

title: Plenty of Lum-chan's!
Certain Death! Stand-Up Eating Contest
The Great Vault! Courageous Survival!
Operation: Peek in the Woman's Bath
Sakura, Sad Years of Youth
Burning Ran's Emotional Video Mail
Sakura-san of my youth!
Scramble! To the Rescue of Lum!
description: After a fight with Ataru one night, Lum goes up to her UFO. As she sleeps, her ship crashes on Mendou's estate, and she has lost her memory. Mendou later tells Ataru that Lum is now staying with him, and will fight to keep her there.

title: A Fight to the Death! Ataru vs. the Mendou Brigade!
description: Ataru, and Lum's Stormtroopers infiltrate the Mendou estate to rescue Lum, but with Mendou's massive private army standing in their way, their mission to save her could end up a suicide mission.

title: Dimensional Switch: Where's Darling?
description: Lum keeps crossing into the wrong parallel dimensions, which all lead her to Tomobiki and Ataru, yet exist under far different circumstances. She hopes the next dimension and the next Ataru are actually the real ones.

title: Crash! Her Majesty and the Rugger Man of Love
description: Ryuu has stopped wearing her chest warp, and is noticeably bustier to her classmates. Of course he boys on her rugby team are eager to grope her during the game. A tiny, rugby ball-shaped UFO arrives, and takes Ryuu, Ataru and Lum on board.

title: Ran-chan, Tasting the Tearful Love of a First Kiss
The Indelible Magic Lipstick
description: After a lipstick ad takes the country by storm, Lum concocts her own magnetic lipstick in hopes to get Ataru to kiss her. However, Ataru has other plans for the lipstick.

title: Deadly Combat! The Mendou Family's Flower Display Death Match
Benten & Ryuunosuke: Run for the Morrow!
description: Ryuunosuke and Benten bond as they search for a little girl's lost kitten and fight off a gang of motorcycle punks.

title: Great Horrors! Oyuki Is Finally Angered!!
description: Ran visits Oyuki to complain about the Neptunian lemmings which ate her food for Rei. Ran later discovers that the lemming leader aboard her ship, eating everything in sight. Oyuki makes a surprise visit to Earth, searching for the lemming.

title: Ten-chan's Wonderful Love Story
description: Ten befriends the ghost of a young girl whose dying wish was to hold a puppy.

title: Haunted House Special! Quest for Mendou Estate Treasure!!
description: Mendou's grandfather implores him to seek out a family treasure, the map of which is on the body of a rare Antarctic octopus that lives on the estate.

title: Love and Fighting Spirits! Battle of Glove vs. Pants!!
Lum-chan's Becoming a Cow?!
description: Lum and Ataru visit a pet shop which has a cow among other things. The cow bites Lum's hand, and later she discovers that her horns have grown long like a cow's. She then fears that she is slowly turning into a cow.

title: Great Achievement! The Film of Lum-chan's Youth
description: Megane's directing a movie, and asked Mendou, Shinobu, Ataru and Lum to participate. Prior to filming, he individually pitched to them wildly different storylines in order to get them on board. What is this film really about anyway?

title: Ghostbusting! Exorcising the Beautiful Sakura!
description: Cherry has taken Sakura's wand to be purified, so now all the ghosts and goblins are haunting her in the school infirmary, causing her much grief.

title: Attack of the Protozoa! Panic at the Poolside
description: After Ataru and the other guys clean out the school's swimming pool, Ten accidentally drops his alien snacks in the water, causing the protozoa in the water to grow to gigantic sizes.

title: Here Again! The Hunter of Love, Princess Kurama
description: Princess Kurama is back, and now she's set her sights on Rei, much to Ran's chagrin. Kurama's taken Rei away, and Ran enlists a reluctant Lum to travel to Kurama's place to get him back. Kurama has no idea that Rei can turn into a tiger-cow, and her crow underlings desperately try to keep her from ever finding out.

title: The Fox's Unrequited Love
description: After Shinobu saves him from a pack of dogs, a little fox becomes smitten with her and attempts to return the favor.

title: Ryuunosuke Confused! Solid Rock Mother Cherishes Her Young Pebble!
The Stairs! Footsteps in the Girls Dorm!!
Pool Spooks! Burning with Forbidden Love
Ran-chan's Panic: No Tomorrow for Tomobiki
Where Is Love's Home? Kuriko and Chôjûrô
Man or Bird? An Opulent and Luxurious Superhero!
description: After yet another clobbering from Ataru, Ten encounters a traveling superhero with a ridiculously long name, and he gives Ten various accessories to make him into a superhero too.

roles.char: Super Delicious Planet Golden Special Reserve Gorgeous Aftercare Kit #28

title: Attack Your Seniors! The Revenge of the Girl Trio
description: The three "Spice Girls" - Sugar, Pepper, and Ginger, have come to Earth to mess with Lum. Ataru and Lum make a deal that is she doesn't lose her temper for 3 days, he will to go on a date with her.

title: Hidden Talent Show of Fire! Performing Is Our Life!
Don't Die! Ryôko Special Straw Doll!!
Omiai Hell! Is the Armored Girl a Beauty? Or a Beast?
description: Mendou learns he is arranged to marry the sister of Tobimaro, and Tobimaro learns that he actually has a sister.

title: Love of the Armored Girl! Maidenly Feelings Reeling
I Dearly Need You! Return of the Honest Fox!
I Hate Gossiping Flowers!
The Birth of Ten-chan's Son? I Didn't Know a Thing
Lum's Courageous Duel! An Ironic Victory
description: After a high school student is bullied by Soban, Lum intervenes. The girl then sets a fight between Lum and Soban. Lum, realizing that she does not have the strength to defeat Soban, decides to 'cheat' by using strength-enhancing drugs.

title: Job Hunting! Return of the Runaway Ninja Kaede!!
description: The female ninja Kaede has escaped from her master Yatsude into Tomobiki, where she wishes to start a new life.

title: Tomobiki High School Survival! Who Are the Survivors?
The Mysterious Giant Cake! Love's Fleeing Panic!!
Underground Reincarnation! What's Darling Thinking Of!?
Play Panic? The Mendou Family Cherry Blossom Display Banquet!!
From the Far Spring! The Tale of the Lonely Fairy!!
To Dreamland! Darling Battle Royal Abduction
Return of the Girl Trio! The Great Scheme to Seduce Darling!!
description: The Spice Girls return to Earth to try and use sex appeal to seduce Ataru away from Lum. Poor Ataru's finds it rather difficult to go on his usual 'girl hunts' today, with these three constantly following him around and bugging him.

title: The Scampering Kotatsu Neko! Anything to Get Warm
Ryuunosuke's Father's Self Sacrificing Devotion! His Wife Is Within Images!
Spring Blossom! Frozen by Oyuki's Cold
Panic Among Friends! I Love to Eat Blowfish
The Armored Girl Returns! Plenty of Older Brothers
The Boredom Syndrome! Is Tomobiki Wasting Away?
Look Out, Ran! Kotatsu Neko's Primary Love Is Oden!?
The Armored Girl Returns Again! A Storm Raising Date
Arrival of the Mysterious Priest! The Bell Battle Royal
First Love Relived!? A Return to the Past for Lum and Rei
Appearance of the Youthful Old Man! Shine, Great Teahouse of Dreams!
I Love Darling's Sincerity
description: Ataru agrees to help the ghost of a young girl fulfill her dying wish so she can go to Heaven. Her wish was to have Ataru wear the sweater she made for him, and to go on a date with Ataru... much to Lum's annoyance.

title: The Honest Fox Again! I Love Shinobu
I Love the Sea! Prayers for the Thriving Hamajaya!?
Ryuunosuke vs. Benten! The Fruitless Duel of Passion
description: Benten and Ryuunosuke meet again, Benten tries to pick a fight with Ryuunosuke, and Ryuunosuke tells Benten to be more feminine. After several near-fights, the Principal decides to settle once and for all which girl is the most feminine by forcing them to take part in a domestic play, and both girls play the housewife.

title: The Magic Bottle! What's to Become of Me?
The Great Devil's Debut! Lum's Dangerous Purchase!
Goodness! Words Aren't Getting to Darling
The Devil's Summer! Ten-chan's Eel Lunch Plot!
Visitation Panic! I Didn't Mean Any Harm
Scary! Is That an Octopus on Shutaro's Head?
Invader from Space! He's After Lum's Lips!
Space Survival! They Are the Eaters
It's a Thrill! The Terrible Overhead Cooler
description: It's a sweltering summer day, and everyone's all hot and bothered, except Lum. She's staying cool with an alien cooler that produces a floating, mind-controlled ice block. She gives some to her classmates, but warns them that stress will make the blocks of ice grow and come crashing down on their heads. If the stress levels reach their peak, then the user's fantasies will become projected in the ice, which opens up all sorts of impure possibilities for Ataru.

title: Love Attack! The Romance Never Stops!!
Rare Form! Worries for Mother the Firefighter!!
Hard-selling Happiness! Out of Focus Bluebird!!
Great Uproar! Ryuunosuke's First Time Wearing a Swimsuit!!
I Want a Bride! The Fox's Love Adventure!
How Persistent! The Girl Trio's Great Animal Plan!
Fast Money in Fast Fighting! Hamajaya's Forbidden Business
Wish Upon a Star! The Winning Family's Consumer Panic
Special Delivery Kiss! Darling's First Jealousy!
Scary Sake! Sakura's Possession a Big Failure
It's Strange! Cherry's Yoga School!
Good-bye Onsen-Sensei!? Tearful Good-bye Marathon Banquet!
Pure Love Sakura! The Slippery Soap of Separation?
Asuka vs. Older Brother! Battle for Certain Love!
Darling's Ill Omen! The Dreaded Fourth Dimensional Oracle!!
New Years Panic! The Mendou Family's Human Parcheesi Tournament!
Dreaming Ten-chan! The Great Adventure at the End of the Rainbow!
I Want to Date! Ataru's Test Program!
Darling Said He Loved Me
Death-Defying House Call! A Teacher Life Is Dangerous Too!!
Total Chaos! Ran-chan's Giant Doll!
Blind Love! You Bet Your Life, Honest Fox
Come Quickly, Darling! Lum's Dangerous Marriage Talk
It's Unbearable! Ran's Mischief Campaign
Urusei Yatsura Pre-Departure Special! Shine!
description: It is a week before the final episode of Urusei Yatsura, and Cherry shows clips of episodes that were nominated by fans as their favorite.

title: All-Star Banquet! We Are Immortal!!
